mapper.sql: from permissions p LEFT JOIN roles_permissions rp on p.permission_id=rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN user_roles ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN users u on ur.user_id=u.user_id
mapper.select: select password from users where user_name =#{userName}
select r.role_id from roles r LEFT JOIN user_roles ur on r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN users u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_name = #{userName}

select p.permission_url
where u.user_name = #{userName} and p.permission_url is not null and p.permission_url !=''
